title: Almost Expressa, but not quite...
content:
Could someone help me ID this font? It’s almost Expressa, but the ’r’ is a misfit... :-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007051921im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_b_4297.jpg)

Thanks for the feedback.

 [‹ Font ID Help](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007051921/http:/typophile.com/node/50115 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sans caps on "Motor Comptoir Zurich 1932" vintage poster by Otto Baumberger ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007051921/http:/typophile.com/node/50067 "Go to next forum topic")
author: azuleon

comments.content:
Thanks! Now, why didn’t \*I\* see that before?... Looking for the complex when things are simple... Oh, well...

Thanks a lot.
